snippet: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel said a “pivot” in American foreign policy in Asia remained a priority, despite conflicts in the Middle East and budget crises at home.
abstract: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel says a 'pivot' in American foreign policy in Asia remains a priority, despite conflicts in the Middle East and budget crises at home; after only seven months in the job, Hagel is on his third trip as defense secretary to the region.

byline.contributor: Gerry Mullany contributed reporting from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel said a “pivot” in American foreign policy in Asia remained a priority, despite conflicts in the Middle East and budget crises at home.

headline.main: Back in Asia, Hagel Pursues Shift to Counter China’s Goals in Pacific
headline.print_headline: Back in Asia, Hagel Pursues Shift To Counter China’s Goals in Pacific
